# Lesson Learned Template

Copy this template when adding a new entry to [LESSONS-LEARNED.md](../LESSONS-LEARNED.md).

---

## YYYY-MM-DD: [Title]

### What Happened
Brief description of the situation or problem.

### The Problem
- What went wrong
- Why it was a problem
- What you expected vs what happened

### The Solution
- What you did to fix it
- Steps taken
- Tools used

### Lesson Learned
**Key takeaway in bold.**
- Specific learning points
- How to avoid this in the future
- General principles discovered

### Related Documentation
- Links to updated docs
- Where this is now documented

---

## Instructions

1. Replace `YYYY-MM-DD` with the current date
2. Replace `[Title]` with a brief, descriptive title
3. Fill in each section
4. Add the entry to `LESSONS-LEARNED.md` (above the template section)
5. Update `CHANGELOG.md` to note the new lesson
